game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Nathan Pipe, Tressa Groelsma, Saxton Stafford Class to store data pertaining to each player.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Constructs a player object.

    • Method Detail

      • chooseTrump

        public Suit chooseTrump()
        Chooses a suit to be trump based on quantity of bowers in hand and/or frequency of suits.
        Returns:
        The desired suit to be trump, or NULL if no choice.

      • pickUp

        public boolean pickUp(Card c)
        Chooses whether or not to have the dealer pick up the initial card.
        Parameters:
        c - The card to check for the dealer to pick up.
        Returns:
        True if the player wants them to pick it up.

      • swap

        public void swap(Card c)
        Swaps the card on the top of the discard pile with one in the player's hand.
        Parameters:
        c - The card on top of the discard pile.

      • choosePlay

        public Card choosePlay(java.util.ArrayList<Card> table,
                       Suit trump)
        Looks at what cards are on the table and chooses which card to play.
        Parameters:
        table - An ArrayList of cards that have been played this trick.
        trump - The trump suit of this round.
        Returns:
        A card from the player's hand that they choose to play.

      • addToHand

        public void addToHand(Card c)
        Adds a card to the player's hand.
        Parameters:
        c - The card to be added to the hand.

      • getHand

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> getHand()
        Accessor method for hand.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of the cards in the players hand.

      • setPartner

        public void setPartner(Player p)
        Sets the partner for this player and sets the partner for the Player in the parameter's partner to this Player.
        Parameters:
        p - The partner of the player.

      • getPartner

        public Player getPartner()
        Accessor method for partner instance variable.
        Returns:
        Partner of the player.

      • getFavoriteSuit

        public Suit getFavoriteSuit()
        Private helper method to assist in AI functions.
        Returns:
        the preferred suit, given the player's hand
